about:
Hi, I'm Matt Sass. a web developer passionate about creating beautiful and functional websites. I specialize in front-end development and enjoy learning new technologies to enhance my skills. My journey started with HTML and CSS, and now I work with JavaScript, React, and other modern web technologies.

When I'm not coding, I enjoy traveling, photography, and exploring new hobbies.
